auth.errorStoringUser: Could not initialize user session. Please try refreshing.

clientJourney.title: Your Onboarding Journey
clientJourney.step1_desc: Choose your plan and fill out the initial form.
clientJourney.step2_desc: Automated generation and digital signature of your proposal and contract.
clientJourney.step3_desc: Make the initial payment via Stripe or Pagar.me link.
clientJourney.step4_desc: Your agent will be activated within 5 business days after contract signature and model approval.
clientJourney.step5_desc: Full dashboard access granted to view and manage your agent.
clientJourney.step6_desc: Ongoing agent improvement through feedback and reprogramming (Highly Recommended).
clientJourney.step7_desc: Humanized support via WhatsApp and scheduled meetings.
